author: Dave Gamer
comment: Awesome app that fools everyone.  The card scroller is top-notch! 😉  The only issue I can see is maybe have the card appear for a shorter length of time on the watch.  It only  needs to show for a couple seconds.  I am using this app with the invisible deck, and it kills!

author: Ben Nicol
comment: So much fun baffling friends and family with this app. The kids are amazed and think I'm magic! And nobody has a clue how it's done. Well done to the developer for promptly fixing the only issue I had with this app, too. Five stars!

reply.author: H2Play
reply.content:
Thank you Sir.
I Fixed it.

title: Excellent app!

reply.author: H2Play
reply.content:
Sir~ What do you mean?
More design?

author: Keon Parsa
comment: Screen on watch has to be on at time of selection or will now work. Maybe have it so that the screen will not shut off when the app is open.

reply.author: H2Play
reply.content:
Thank you sir~.
Screen shut off is the way to save your trick.
And Is your screen on at once?
I developed at once and my device screen on at once...
can you please contact for more information?

title: Great idea, needs bug fixes
